item.title: Friday - Jumat
item.description:
08:00–09:00

Morning Routine

Relaxed breakfast and preparation.

09:00–12:00

AI and ML Deep Work

Study NLP fundamentals: tokenization and embeddings. Test HuggingFace sentiment analysis demo.

12:00–13:00

Lunch and Break

13:00–15:00

Interview Preparation

Work on a small system design problem (URL shortener or chat app). Draw architecture diagrams and note trade-offs.

15:00–18:00

Game Development

Enhance your game prototype: add menus, score, and health systems. Playtest and fix bugs.

18:00–19:00

Dinner

19:00–20:00

Skill Touch – Drawing

Practice sketching hands and feet for 1 hour.

20:00–23:30

Flex / Stream Block

Stream game prototype playtest, casual gaming, or research investing/trading topics.

23:30–08:00

Sleep

Next

Saturday - Sabtu
Saturdays schedule.

item.title: Thursday - Kamis
item.description:
08:00–09:00

Morning Routine

Morning prep and breakfast.

09:00–12:00

AI and ML Deep Work

Learn CNN theory and train a CIFAR-10 image classifier in PyTorch.

12:00–13:00

Lunch and Break

13:00–15:00

Interview Preparation

Practice dynamic programming problems: Fibonacci, coin change, and LIS.

15:00–18:00

Drawing Practice

Perspective exercises (1-point and 2-point). Human figure sketches with proportions.

18:00–19:00

Dinner

19:00–20:00

Skill Touch – Japanese Vocabulary

Add 20 new words to Anki and review past sets.

20:00–23:30

Flex / Stream Block

Stream drawing session or watch digital art tutorials.

23:30–08:00

Sleep

Next

friday - Jumat
Fridays schedule.

item.title: Tuesday - Selasa
item.description:
08:00–09:00

Morning Routine

Breakfast, light cleaning, and journaling.

09:00–12:00

AI and ML Deep Work

Learn logistic regression and decision trees; implement them from scratch in Python.

12:00–13:00

Lunch and Break

Relax and reset focus.

13:00–15:00

Interview Preparation

Practice linked list and stack problems on LeetCode; analyze time and space complexity.

15:00–18:00

Full-Stack Development

Learn Next.js fundamentals: routing, pages, and layouts. Build a simple markdown blog.

18:00–19:00

Dinner

Eat and stretch.

19:00–20:00

Skill Touch – Drawing

Sketch 5 household objects and 5 dynamic poses.

20:00–23:30

Flex / Stream Block

Stream Next.js coding session, play games, or explore Supabase backend tutorials.

23:30–08:00

Sleep

Next

Wednesday - Rabu
Wednesdays schedule.

item.title: Wednesday - Rabu
item.description:
08:00–09:00

Morning Routine

Prepare breakfast, tidy up workspace.

09:00–12:00

AI and ML Deep Work

Study neural networks (forward and backpropagation). Implement a simple model in PyTorch using MNIST.

12:00–13:00

Lunch and Break

13:00–15:00

Interview Preparation

Solve graph BFS and DFS problems (2–3). Review core graph theory notes.

15:00–18:00

Japanese Study Session

Focus on grammar particles (は, が, を). Practice with short sentences and 20 minutes of NHK Easy News listening.

18:00–19:00

Dinner

19:00–20:00

Skill Touch – Drawing

Quick sketch session focusing on facial expressions.

20:00–23:30

Flex / Stream Block

Stream Japanese learning session or watch anime with Japanese subtitles for listening practice.

23:30–08:00

Sleep

Next

Thursday - Kamis
Thursdays schedule.

item.title: Monday - Senin
item.description:
08:00-09:00

Morning Routine

Pray, breakfast, workout.

09:00-12:00

AI and ML Deep Work

Revise core ML concepts (linear regression, classification), practice on the Kaggle Titanic dataset, and read one fresh paper summary or tutorial blog.

12:00-13:00

Lunch and Reset

Eat, hydrate, and step away from screens to keep energy high.

13:00-15:00

Interview Prep

Solve two array problems and one string problem on LeetCode, then review solutions and capture recurring patterns.

15:00-18:00

Game Dev Lab

Follow the Godot “Your First 2D Game” tutorial and ship a basic Pong prototype.

18:00-19:00

Dinner

Take a slow meal and decompress.

19:00-20:00

Skill Touch (Japanese)

Run a 20-minute Anki review and add 10 new vocabulary cards.

20:00-23:30

Freestudy or Stream

Stream a Godot devlog, relax with entertainment, or study trading basics while choosing what feels right.

23:30-08:00

Sleep

Wind down and protect a full 8.5-hour rest window.

Next

Tuesday - Selasa
Tuesdays schedule.
